Sentencas: Thick YSZ (8 mol% Y(2)O(3)-ZrO(2)) films were coated by EPD, which was performed on non-conducting and graphite-coated NiO-YSZ composites.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Weights of depositions had depended on the applied voltage linearly for both types of NiO-YSZ composites.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In addition, weights of depositions were significantly higher when graphite-coated substrates were used.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Uniform and dense depositions were successfully obtained by both methods.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Adhesion strength was evaluated by micro hardness testing.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: However, it was observed that the interfacial adhesion was improved when graphite-coated substrates were used.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The qualities of the deposited YSZ films were different after the subsequent sintering and cracks were developed on the surface of sintered YSZ films when non-conducting substrates were used.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: SEM observations showed that there were thicker YSZ films on the graphite-coated substrates than on the non-conducting ones.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: After the reduction process, NiO-YSZ composites were altered to Ni-YSZ cermet, which showed a good electrical conductivity all over it.
Titulo: The role of electrical conductivity of substrate on the YSZ film formed by EPD for solid oxide fuel cell applications
